name: Notion Life OS
description: Notion Life OS UPDATEThe life OS now also includes a 25-page template guide that you get free with the templateWhy did I create this templatewhen downloading notion with the thousands of inspirational dashboards, systems and templates you can find on the internet, it can be frustrating when you start with a blank page. I have seen many people who are new to notion and are completely overwhelmed with all the features that notion has to offer. this system has enabled me to make my everyday life mo
features: you arenewto notion; you don't havetimeto build your own working system in notion; you need afunctioningsystem that will get you to your goals; you want to start organizing your life in notion without watching 100+ hours of tutorials; Start planning and organizing without having to build a system first; Save your knowledge in an intelligent knowledge bank; Save 100+ hours on tutorials, reading articles and building your own system; organize your life with life areas, projects, tasks, goals and habit trackers; No tedious work on your notion system; Never forget a task or a note again
